column1: Honored to share I’ve been selected to serve on the Financial Services Committee. Collin County is home to hundreds of financial services companies who support more than 45000 local jobs. This is a huge win for our District & I'm excited to get to work! https://t.co/lhIzxIjw91 https://t.co/QGxZX6SIDm
I'm proud we were able to get this critical legislation across the finish line. #USMCA will create even more jobs in Collin County Texas and throughout the United States. https://t.co/roD9uvwk7L

CALLING ALL STUDENTS! Show your support and appreciation for veterans by participating in my Valentines for Veterans Program! Drop off your valentines to my office before 2/11/20 & I’ll deliver them to veterans at the North Texas VA healthcare system! https://t.co/OnCsGvsTW1 https://t.co/lKQOqIDohX

For decades the Iranian regime has been the antagonist for peace and civility in the Middle East. The strike on Soleimani was just and legal and most importantly ensures he will never take another American life. https://t.co/GEUR6oC7Xb

17 years ago today my @USMC Reserve Unit deployed to Iraq. Like many who serve I was uncertain of what the future would hold but was filled with a love for my country. Thank you to all who have served & those who will follow in their stead. A grateful nation supports you. https://t.co/xGL0It04fk
Severe storms expected across North Texas tonight. Follow local news &  @NWSFortWorth for important weather alerts. Stay informed and safe!  https://t.co/1P6IjR9szp

To the heroes who risk their lives to keep our communities and families safe we cannot thank you enough. Happy #LawEnforcementAppreciation Day to our courageous officers in Collin County! https://t.co/9GZ3HHO12S

Qassem Soleimani is responsible for the death of hundreds of Americans thousands of lives lost in the Middle East and posed an imminent danger to our nation. Seventeen years ago I witnessed Iran’s efforts to undermine democracy and oppress their people... https://t.co/9mSVrWPgDI
Have a safe and happy new year! https://t.co/a5q7bwjzWQ
With your help my first year in Congress focused on bringing our Texas solutions to Washington. Wrapping up 2019 with a look back at all we accomplished together! https://t.co/N9gHJGy10v
From my family to yours Merry Christmas! 🎄 https://t.co/3Z8TJxIevd
May the lights of Hanukkah brighten your homes and warm your hearts. Happy Hanukkah! https://t.co/hh0rgie7VR

BREAKING: The House just voted to pass #USMCA - a huge win for job creators & families right here in North Texas! As a result families in Collin County will see more job opportunities increased wages and lower cost of goods.   Read more here: https://t.co/RkgpK8xPFu https://t.co/qbtLPvdf7z

As cyberattacks become increasingly common and threaten the well-being of millions of Americans we must work to prevent and stop these attacks. My bill helps ensure smaller units of government have access to the resources and tools needed to protect their digital systems. https://t.co/I2gKJf32Mo

Thank you to @repmikerogersal @RepAlGreen @HurdOnTheHill @repjimmypanetta @RepMichaelGuest and @RepSlotkin for cosponsoring this legislation and @NASCIO @CISecurity @TexasDIR @cityofplanotx @CityOfFriscoTx and @mckinneyisd for supporting the bill!

This year in Texas more than 50 local governments & school districts were hit by cyber attacks. My bill the Strengthening State & Local Cybersecurity Defenses Act will help ensure smaller units of government have access to resources & tools to protect their digital systems. https://t.co/7i3YCkjZau

Just introduced new legislation the Strengthening State and Local Cybersecurity Defenses Act in the House! My bipartisan bill will help protect state and local governments and the sensitive information they store from ransomware and cyberattacks. https://t.co/fN8ARQhjND

This week I joined fellow Texan @MichaelCBurgess to congratulate the @FriscoChamber on receiving a 5 star accreditation from the @USChamber of Commerce. Thank you for serving as a strong voice for Frisco businesses! https://t.co/AfGqcIGb41

Started off the day returning phone calls from my constituents. Hearing directly from you my constituents about your concerns thoughts and ideas helps me represent #TX03 in Congress! https://t.co/0JZ5e8AcsD

There is no question trade is a major driver of our Texas economy – this is especially true for Collin County. Excited to stand with my Republican and Democrat colleagues from Texas today as we work to get #USMCA across the finish line! https://t.co/8RpxWTPmx8
Thank you Coach Brence for 39 years of outstanding service to student athletes at @Plano_Schools! We wish you the best of luck as you start this next chapter! https://t.co/wcnwWikbOs
Just in ➡️ The 2019 Safest Cities in America list was just released with @cityofplanotx ranking #1 in the state and #3 of the entire country! #TX03 https://t.co/CH8v4MfAnB
Small businesses are the backbone of our economy and our communities.   Today on #SmallBusinessSaturday support our local Collin County businesses and #ShopSmall! https://t.co/KoG5dWIUNu

As we enjoy this precious time with loved ones let us take a moment to remember the countless blessings we are so fortunate to have in this country and appreciate those who sacrifice this time with their families to serve.   Happy Thanksgiving! 🦃 https://t.co/rQecLYQqvB
Enjoyed welcoming the Drapers from Frisco the Lynns from Prosper and the Rodartes from Richardson to the United States Capitol. It was great visiting with you all! https://t.co/b4HBa6tBbR

From combat to Congress I am so proud to be part of the bipartisan For Country Caucus and was honored to join fellow veterans as our caucus was recognized by the @USGLC during their tribute dinner last week. https://t.co/LDHAdOq0kd

Instead of focusing on scoring political points Congress should be working on issues impacting all Americans. Last week I joined w/ @HomelandGOP to ask the Chairman to prioritize bipartisan bills to reauthorize @DHSgov secure our border & protect Americans from cyber-attacks. https://t.co/dWlvSZPwRf

Constituent meeting #381 in the books!   Dr. Kazan from Richardson an Ophthalmologist with @AAO_ophth stopped by my office to discuss step therapy burdens drug shortages and my legislation to end surprise medical billing. https://t.co/6Ln5twK6wo

Celebrating the achievements of tomorrow’s leaders is always a highlight of representing Collin County in Congress. I was honored to recognize Shawn Gititu who earned the Bronze Congressional Award for his volunteer service physical fitness and personal development! https://t.co/R8kYY9IzH9

This morning @RepMichaelWaltz @RepJimmyPanetta @RepConorLamb @RepBost @RepAbraham @RepRiggleman & I headed out to the Korean War Memorial to do some landscaping. While we can never repay those who have sacrificed so much we can show gratitude in our everyday actions. https://t.co/G9eqi5j2Pi

While giving a behind-the-scenes evening tour of the Capitol lat night the North Texas Crime Commission surprised me with the "Crime Fighter of the Year" Award. Thank you for all your efforts to keep our communities safe from harm! https://t.co/jQ5Gc9ljVi
As your Representative in Congress I work for you. Sign up for updates on my work serving you now! https://t.co/vBL7cjl3E3 https://t.co/yAt3tBHqb4

Joined with fellow Global War on Terror veterans in Congress yesterday morning for a sunrise run to scout potential locations for the GWOT Memorial we’re working to construct in Washington DC. Learn more about our bill here: https://t.co/7veHfGowNI https://t.co/K5jUL9rIjG

Met with @DallasMayor last week and discussed tornado recovery and infrastructure funding for North Texas!  Enjoy teaming up with local leaders to solve obstacles facing our communities. https://t.co/i0d86EAyf6

With open enrollment underway I priced out coverage for a family of five like my own in Collin County under #Obamacare. $30000 a year and a $16000 deductible is NOT affordable. https://t.co/TJw2AtIdic

Congrats to Allen Fairview Frisco McKinney Murphy Plano Prosper and Wylie for receiving this year’s Tree City USA designation by the @arborday Foundation. Thanks for creating a lasting and positive impact! https://t.co/DiLZtuaZYM

The United States International Trade Commission estimates #USMCA will raise U.S. real GDP by $68.2 billion and create at least 17600 new American jobs - but I want your opinion!  Share your thoughts on the proposed agreement with me now!  ---> https://t.co/GrNA2aL9cc https://t.co/2eo0fZMoPE
Tonight I’m calling 40000 households in #TX03 from Washington to discuss USMCA impeachment veterans issues and healthcare. Answer your phones! ☎️ https://t.co/XdTjGqjrmG

Many veterans rely on @DeptVetAffairs for their healthcare but getting to & from their appointments can be challenging. Proud to introduce bipartisan legislation w/ @RepJimmyPanetta so veterans have reliable transportation to healthcare services: https://t.co/hQxecPoTW7 https://t.co/OkXtI4dJvH

This morning I held my 365th constituent meeting since taking office and enjoyed my discussion with Plano resident Richard Bradley from the @CitizensClimate Lobby! Contact my office if you’d to meet! https://t.co/7EvgxlXl8t

Sergeant Major Henry W. Hundley served in the @USArmy where he spent 3 brutal yrs as a POW in Camp O’Donell until the end of WWII. During this weekend’s Flags of Honor Ceremony in @CityOfPlanoTX I had the great privilege of presenting the Bronze Star Award to his son & grandson. https://t.co/k0T60LsEuC

To my fellow veterans and their families who know the true cost of defending the greatest country in the world - thank you. Your countless sacrifices and enduring dedication ensure all Americans have the opportunity to live freely.   Happy #VeteransDay! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/eBK7ePz7YO
Always proud to be a #Marine! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/tIySgi5CVD
Happy 244th Birthday #Marines! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/ZqKL8bl4wQ
Wrapped up the week providing a legislative update to members of the @McKinneyChamber of Commerce. Thanks for inviting me to discuss my work on your behalf in Congress. https://t.co/DSleTEzmKB
Congratulations to @bgccollincounty on the launch of their #AgendaforAmericasYouth and thank you for helping prepare our kids to be the leaders of tomorrow. https://t.co/dNlxfTv9xt

A special thanks to Melissa Rotary for having me out on this rainy morning. During this month of thanks I am grateful for our many Collin County rotarians and for the countless ways they better our community. https://t.co/oa7NBVOAXU

In 1964 @USArmy Captain Tom Barta was awarded the Air Force Commendation Medal after he piloted a helicopter rescue in Viet Cong territory. After his home & military awards were completely destroyed by a fire I had the honor of helping him replace this precious medal. 🇺🇸 https://t.co/Z6YNgZKWFb

Navigating Medicare can be a complicated process but you don’t have to go at it alone. Thanks to everyone who came out to my Medicare Information Session this morning including the North Central Texas Area Agency on Aging @AARP & @AlzDallasNETX. https://t.co/k3d9PScqOW

DON’T FORGET: U.S. Service Academy Nomination applications are due in my Collin County office no later than Friday November 15 2019 by 5pm! For questions please call (972) 202-4150! 🇺🇸  https://t.co/94MiHrpvLU

Thank you to volunteers throughout North Texas helping our communities recover from last week’s tornadoes. We’re always stronger when we come together to provide hope and support to our neighbors. WATCH: https://t.co/0ZlnMBYoyM

As a Marine who served in Iraq I know how much something as simple as a care package from back home can mean. Today I joined @the_USO to help stuff 2000 care packages for our service men and women who are deployed. https://t.co/cCIXAWN4Dh

Thank you to every one who gathered together on Saturday to honor the recipients of the 2019 Congressional Veteran Commendation. The outpouring of support shown for our Collin County veterans was inspiring & I am so grateful to all those who helped put on such a wonderful event. https://t.co/BPkh2XSJkA

Navigating Medicare Open Enrollment can be a daunting task. Be sure to attend my free Medicare Information Session on November 5 2019 to learn more about the program and speak with experts! INFO: https://t.co/DxNiU6uzz6 https://t.co/7BlCEYl3WU

After being denied access last week I sent a letter to Chairman Schiff requesting to review any relevant documents the Committee has related to impeachment inquiry. All Members regardless of party should have access to all info. regarding the ongoing inquiry of the President. https://t.co/7MEPQ5fxOq

It's my pleasure to present the 12 recipients of the #TX03 2019 Congressional Veteran Commendation. INFO: https://t.co/HgUCBa8JNC https://t.co/cDWpTCPJFF

Wrapping up tonight’s telephone town hall from Washington. Thank you to those who took time out of your busy day to share your thoughts on the issues impacting you and your families. https://t.co/BBJvafmcf3

Students who participate in high school dual credit programs are more successful in college. My bill will expand access to dual credit courses showcase the incredible work of Collin County schools & prepare students to enter the workforce. INFO: https://t.co/rBqWUWOR08 https://t.co/GaWT6Ehkm0

A proud day for Chancellor Sharp & the @TAMU @TXExtension Center in Dallas as they opened the new Water & Land Resources Building. Can't wait to see how this world-class institution advances urban ag while promoting innovation in nutrition & food security. #GigEm 👍 https://t.co/bZ6d5mP8F6

As the second largest producer of video games in the country Texas is leading the way in cutting edge software development. Thanks to the Frisco-based @GearboxOfficial for welcoming me into their studio! 🎮 https://t.co/ianEUOaO76

On 10/26/19 @JohnWayneWaldin will join me in Plano to recognize the 12 recipients of my Congressional Veteran Commendation. I hope you’ll join us & I can’t wait for you to hear his story while learning about the amazing veterans who serve our community every single day. https://t.co/SYoJB21lap
